review: Very simple and works. I tried the amazon fire stick and this is much better. I got the fire stick for the living room cause I thought it be easy for everyone to use because it had a remote. It lags and goes back to the home screen instead of playing videos. Also I payed for prime and figured I'd get it for the instant video. Big mistake.This works straight from the phone and I have one in the bedroom and living room. No lag. No complications. Just play from your phone and it goes right to the TV no issues. Just won't do amazon video. Although I didn't find much that amazon had more than Netflix that I wanted to watch.
